settings.ctm_description: Made from 100% pharmaceutical-grade lanolin. Ethically sourced from Merino Sheep in New Zealand. Single ingredient. All natural. Hypoallergenic. Unscented. Clear natural-gloss finish. Designed to repair, protect, and deeply hydrate. Metal applicator tip cools on contact for soothing relief. Backed by science, rooted in nature.
settings.cta_bottom_text_2: Free standard shipping on all US orders over $70.

settings.title: Dispense
settings.content: Squeeze a small amount of Super Lanolin™ onto the cooling metal applicator tip.

settings.title: Apply
settings.content: Gently apply the Super Lanolin™ onto your lips, using the cooling metal applicator to evenly spread the product.

settings.title: Glow
settings.content: Allow the Super Lanolin™ to fully absorb, leaving your lips deeply hydrated, soft and plump with a natural gloss finish.

settings.review: My lips have never looked or felt better. There is a truly healing effect to Super Lanolin that you just can't describe until you try it for yourself.
settings.name: Jennifer F.

settings.review: I only have to apply morning and night. It's the longest lasting lip balm I've ever used and it's so soothing. Lifetime customer here!
settings.name: Casey T.

settings.review: I love the thicker consistency of this product. It stays on my lips for hours. The metal applicator smoothly delivers the perfect amount too. Thanks, Clae!
settings.name: Laura M.

settings.question: What is Lanolin?
settings.answer: Lanolin is a rich, wax-like oil naturally derived from sheep's wool. It is extremely rich and nourishing to the skin.

settings.question: Is Lanolin Natural?
settings.answer: Yes! Lanolin is a 100% natural, single-ingredient product.

settings.question: What makes your Lanolin Super?
settings.answer: Our Lanolin is ethically sourced from a pesticide free sheep farm in Europe, adhering to strict purity standards. It is gently rendered to remove most of the natural occurring scent, while maintaining the nutrient density and healing properties.

settings.question: Is Super Lanolin™ Pregnancy/Baby Safe?
settings.answer: Yes! Super Lanolin™ is safe to use during pregnancy, breastfeeding, and on your baby.

settings.question: Is Lanolin safe for sensitive skin?
settings.answer: Yes, it is hypoallergenic for most people. Some people with wool sensitivities can be allergic or sensitive to lanolin.

settings.question: Is it scented? Does it smell?
settings.answer: Our Lanolin is 100% free of synthetic fragrances. Our rendering process removes most naturally occurring scents, though some report a very light very light waxy / earthy scent.

settings.question: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Yes we do, although, our International customers are personally responsible for any duties, taxes, or fees required by their country outside of the United States.

settings.question: What is it good for?
settings.answer: Lanolin is an excellent moisturizer. Great for dry, cracked, or chapped skin. It is an emollient which helps trap moisture in the skin and is structured similarly to human skin. It’s best for the toughest areas on the body and was originally used to sooth / heal cracked nipples during breast feeding.

settings.question: Where can I get support?
settings.answer: We take pride in delivering outstanding customer care. Reach us at: support@claeskin.com Monday-Friday. We are here for you.

settings.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
settings.answer: Please email us at: support@claeskin.com and we will be happy to assist you.
